skins.shipDescription: Arethusa-class light cruiser ¨C Galatea, Hull Number 71!
skins.selfIntroduction: I am Galatea, the second ship of the Arethusa class. I may not look like it, but in my service in the Mediterranean, I achieved some results~ You'll regret it if you underestimate me~
skins.acquisition: I am Galatea, the 2nd of the Arethusa class~ Do you believe in fate, Commander? It is fate that I meet with you~
skins.login: I'm going to do this and that again today. Please take care of it~
skins.details: Geez~ If you keep on looking at me like that, I'll be reporting you to the authorities~
skins.secretaryIdle1: Commander, I'm wearing new clothes today! --Hmm? I didn't say I'm heading out!
skins.secretaryIdle2: Commander, are you free? How about taking a walk together? I want to link our arms and be seen by the other girls
skins.secretaryIdle3: Hmm? Did you not hear that? ...There's no helping it. Lie down over here and let me check your ears
skins.secretaryTouch: Hehe~ Commander, you really like to engage in skinship, don't you? Well, just this once, I'm allowing you to continue a bit more~
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Ah... You're daring, Commander --Well then, do you want to hear my wishes?
